name: Greg Gay 0002
content: Gregory Gay Gregory Gay Associate Professor, Chalmers and the University of Gothenburg Our society depends on complex software. My research focuses on software testing and analysis, the use of AI to automate development tasks, search-based software engineering, and engineering of AI and ML-based systems, with the aim of helping developers deliver those systems in a safe, secure, and efficient manner. For more, continue scrolling or see my CV.
